faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: No registration is required for students and educators. You may simply access the resources listed. School Administration teams need to register for access to their material. Please contact us for assistance with this.
faqs.hclplatformx_Question: Does one need to register to use the platform?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: Should there be an issue with connecting to any of the resources provided, please do contact us and let us know. We will try and fix as soon as possible.
faqs.hclplatformx_Question: What if a link doesn’t work?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: Yes, this platform is open to all students, educators and school administration in South Africa.
faqs.hclplatformx_Question: Can anyone in South Africa use this platform?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: The Notice Board is Woza Geleza’s section to keep you informed about new materials, challenges, and competitions
The resources provided are all available in English, but some are available in other languages. Please check the various links per resource to see which language it is available in.
faqs.hclplatformx_Question: Are the materials on Woza Geleza available in other languages other than English?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: No, the Woza Geleza platform caters for various persons including School Management Teams, Teachers, Educators, Coaches, students, and the Youth.

faqs.hclplatformx_Question: Are there any certified courses on Woza Geleza?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: Most of the resources on the platform are zero rated, meaning you will not require data to download or access. However, a stable internet connection is required.
faqs.hclplatformx_Question: Is it free to access the courses on Woza Geleza?

faqs.hclplatformx_Answer: Woza Geleza is a platform that provides zero – rated and free education content, learning materials to students, educators and school administrators.
